title: Andrews University Dining Center
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Buffet, Salad bar
description: This is the student dining center for Andrews University is a Seventh-Day Adventist university with an all vegetarian student dining facility. Features a salad bar, Andrews Classics (main entrees), Campus Grill (vegeburgers and vegetarian fast foods), Breakfast Zone (breakfast granolas, etc. all day), World Market (international foods). Open during the school year M-Th 7am-7pm, Fri 7am-6.30pm, Su 10a,-7pm. Meals during their Sabbath must be pre-arranged.
